list_achievements.title: Unique Destiny
list_achievements.info: The Unique Destiny PUBG Mobile Achievement is clearly one of the most time consuming and difficult to achieve. In order to get this glorious achievement you will need to earn 6000 Achievement Points. There is no shortcut to complete this achievement, the more achievements you complete the closer you will get to Unique Destiny. This achievement will reward you with the "Unique Destiny" title, along with the mythic fiend huntress set (not shown).

list_achievements.title: Chicken Expert
list_achievements.description: Win a Solo Classic match in the following ways while in Platinum tier or above.
task_list: Win a Solo Classic match in the following ways while in Platinum tier or above:
Use Assault Rifle to deal the final blow and win a match
Use SMG to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Sniper Rifle to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Shotgun to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Light Machine Gun to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Pistol to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Crossbow to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Melee Weapon to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Throwable to deal the final blow and win a match
Use Vehicle to deal the final below and win a match
list_achievements.info:
The Chicken Expert achievement is challenging, but not impossible. The trickiest weapons to use for the final kill are the pistol, crossbow, melee weapon, and vehicle. It's recommended for this to stay in Platinum V, which is the lowest allowable league for this achievement.

For the pistol kill I would recommend using the P18C. The easiest way to get a final kill with a pistol is to first damage the enemy with your main weapon, then pull out your sidearm and finish them off.

The crossbow is another tricky weapon since the bolts will start dropping after 45m. Crossbows are a one-hit-kill if it's a headshot, so you'll have to aim for the enemies head. An alternative is to damage the enemy first with your main weapon, and then finish with the crossbow, but this is less effective since the enemy will likely start moving after being fired on. Sanhok is a good map for getting this final kill. With all the long grass around, enemies are more likely to prone in the grass in the final circle, which presents a good opportunity for you to aim for the head while they lie still. The long grass will also help you sneak up on the enemy. The enemy won't hear you crawling through the grass if it's over 5m, and so this is a good way to get behind the enemy without them realizing.

For the pan, bring at least 6 smoke grenades into the final circle. Ideally the circle will be inside a building, but this strategy can still work out in the open. When you get down to the last enemy, start throwing smoke grenades your smoke grenades into the circle. Wait until the enemy is in the smoke, then run in with your pan and end them!

The last difficult weapon to get a kill with is a vehicle. I recommend trying this on Erangel since it has the most open, flat terrain. First you'll want to secure a vehicle, preferably a UAZ since this has the most maneuverablity. Make sure to keep your vehicle as undamaged as possible until the final circle, so don't drive around when you don't have to. If the last enemy is behind cover it'll be hard to run them over, so try waiting until they have to run in the open to make your move.
